name: Pyrin Noct

ability.name: Black Hare
ability.description: Can be ridden. Applies Dark damage to the player's attacks while mounted.

description:
It burns mysterious dark matter as energy and expels the remaining particles from its body.
If someone rides it, they should take care so as not to gallop down the path of darkness.

skills.name: Ignis Blast
skills.description: Hurls a ball of fire straight at an enemy.

skills.name: Shadow Burst
skills.description: Quickly discharges dark energy, damaging those around it.

skills.name: Ignis Breath
skills.description: Shoots flames at an enemy, dealing continuous damage.

skills.name: Spirit Flame
skills.description: Fires three balls of malice that relentlessly pursue an enemy.

skills.name: Dark Charge
skills.description: Pyrin Noct's exclusive skill. Charges forward while clad in a veil of dark flames. Flames continue to burn in its trajectory.

skills.name: Ignis Rage
skills.description: Energizes the surrounding ground, causing it to explode after a set amount of time.

skills.name: Dark Laser
skills.description: Charges dark energy before blasting enemies with a powerful beam.
